I do not know that it is the right place to post this error...but it is annoying me every time when i try to open some jsp , xml or java files.

Try to resolve this issue and let me know why iam getting this error.

An internal error occurred during: "Processing Dirty Regions". java.lang.NullPointerException 

Thanks
koti
Can you give a full trace please? If we know what is thowing the NPE then we can route the bug correctly.
Created an attachment (id=84543)
